checks.name: Conversion actions defined
checks.finding: 32 conversion actions configured

checks.name: Enhanced conversions enabled
checks.finding: Not enabled — critical for recovering lost signal with only 12 conv/month

checks.name: Server-side tracking
checks.finding: No server-side GTM or API-based conversion import active

checks.name: Consent Mode v2 (EU/EEA)
checks.finding: EU targeting unclear from available data

checks.name: Conversion window appropriate
checks.finding: Mixed windows (30d-90d). High-ticket furniture ($300-$1,300) may need longer consideration window

checks.name: Micro vs macro separation
checks.finding: 13+ micro/irrelevant actions set as Primary: Add to Cart, Checkout, Page View (/cart), Directions, Engagements, YouTube subs, Smart campaign actions

checks.name: Attribution model
checks.finding: Cannot verify attribution model via API

checks.name: Conversion value assignment
checks.finding: Some dynamic values (GA4 purchase), but many primary actions use static $1 default values

checks.name: No duplicate counting
checks.finding: Duplicate purchase tracking: GA4 Purchase + Shopify Purchase. Multiple phone call actions (4 different ones)

checks.name: GA4 linked and flowing
checks.finding: GA4 linked but purchase action NOT set as Primary — Shopify purchase IS Primary

checks.name: Google Tag firing
checks.finding: Conversions happening but setup inconsistent — 32 actions is excessive

checks.name: Search term audit recency
checks.finding: No active search campaigns; Shopping search terms not recently reviewed

checks.name: Negative keyword lists exist
checks.finding: 2 lists exist (General: 139 kw, Search Terms: 8 kw) but need 3+ themed lists

checks.name: Account-level negatives applied
checks.finding: Lists exist but unclear if applied to the active Shopping campaign

checks.name: Wasted spend on irrelevant terms
checks.finding: ~42% of top product spend ($1,289) goes to zero-conversion products

checks.name: Broad match + smart bidding pairing
checks.finding: No active search campaigns

checks.name: Close variant pollution
checks.finding: No active search campaigns

checks.name: Search term visibility
checks.finding: No search activity in last 30 days

checks.name: Zero-conversion keywords
checks.finding: Shopping campaign — keyword check not applicable

checks.name: Campaign naming convention
checks.finding: 5+ naming prefixes: CTM-, MK-, RIG-, PMax|, no prefix. Evidence of 3+ managers

checks.name: Ad group naming convention
checks.finding: Inconsistent across 2,057 ad groups

checks.name: Single theme ad groups
checks.finding: Active Shopping uses 'Catch All - Winners' — implies no product segmentation

checks.name: Campaign count per objective
checks.finding: 32 campaigns for single-brand ecom store — massive fragmentation. 6 Shopping, 8 PMax, 6 Search campaigns

checks.name: Brand vs Non-Brand separation
checks.finding: No brand campaign exists to protect branded search terms

checks.name: PMax present for eligible accounts
checks.finding: All 8 PMax campaigns paused. 2 reference suspended Merchant Center

checks.name: Search + PMax overlap
checks.finding: No concurrent Search + PMax running

checks.name: Budget allocation matches priority
checks.finding: Only 1 campaign running. $136/day budget but averaging $102/day. SIS only 27%

checks.name: Campaign daily budget vs spend
checks.finding: $136 daily budget, ~$102 actual daily spend — under-delivering

checks.name: Ad schedule configured
checks.finding: Shopping campaign — schedule not critical

checks.name: Geographic targeting accuracy
checks.finding: Active Shopping campaign uses 'Presence' (correct)

checks.name: Network settings
checks.finding: Shopping OK (Search Partners OFF, Display OFF). But enabled Search campaign has Display Network ON

checks.name: Quality Score checks
checks.finding: All search campaigns paused — QS not tracked. 8,710 keywords exist (3,925 Broad, 3,828 Phrase, 957 Exact) but none serving

checks.name: Zero-impression keywords
checks.finding: All keywords inactive — search campaigns paused

checks.name: Keyword-to-ad relevance
checks.finding: Cannot assess — no active search campaigns

checks.name: RSA checks
checks.finding: No active Search campaigns — RSA checks not applicable

checks.name: PMax asset checks
checks.finding: All 8 PMax campaigns paused

checks.name: Ad copy relevance to keywords
checks.finding: Shopping campaign — no ad copy to assess

checks.name: Ad freshness
checks.finding: No new ad creative tested — only 1 Shopping Product Ad running

checks.name: CTR vs industry benchmark
checks.finding: Shopping CTR 0.94% vs ~0.86% industry avg — slightly above benchmark

checks.name: Smart bidding strategy active
checks.finding: Active Shopping campaign uses Manual CPC — no automated bidding

checks.name: Budget constrained campaigns
checks.finding: SIS only 27% — losing 73% of available impressions

checks.name: Manual CPC justification
checks.finding: 12 conv/month is borderline for Smart Bidding (needs 15+) — Manual CPC partially justified

checks.name: Sitelink extensions
checks.finding: 10 sitelinks at campaign level + 6 at account level

checks.finding: 14+ active callouts at account level

checks.finding: 1 structured snippet set enabled

checks.finding: No image extensions — critical for furniture e-commerce

checks.finding: Call extensions active (3 at campaign level, 1 at account level)

checks.finding: No Customer Match lists uploaded — missing past purchaser data

quickWins.action: Set only Purchase + Phone Call as Primary conversions; set everything else to Secondary
Remove duplicate conversion actions (keep 1 purchase, 1 phone)
Pause or delete Display - Labor Day campaign
Fix RIG Search campaign: either activate properly or pause
Add negative product groups for zero-converting products with >$100 spend
Upload Customer Match list from Shopify customer export

items: Clean up conversion tracking — reduce to 3-4 Primary actions: Purchase, Phone Call, Form Submit
Enable Enhanced Conversions for the purchase action
Segment the Shopping campaign — create product groups for top performers vs non-converters vs clearance
Resolve Merchant Center suspension — 2 PMax campaigns reference a suspended merchant
Test Smart Bidding — switch Shopping to Target ROAS (start at 2.0x, current is 2.7x)
Re-launch 1 PMax campaign with proper asset groups: Tables, Consoles, Kitchen Islands, Clearance
Launch a brand Search campaign to protect brand terms
Build remarketing audiences from site visitors, cart abandoners, past purchasers
Increase impression share from 27% toward 50%+ on converting products
Test Demand Gen for upper-funnel furniture discovery
Clean up account — archive/delete the 29 paused campaigns
Implement server-side tracking via server-side GTM
